column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.

Unfortunately, I cannot provide an exact answer to that question. However, life expectancy is largely based on lifestyle factors such as diet, exercise, and managing stress. Additionally, genes can play a role in how long you will live. Taking all of these things into consideration, you can work to maximize your longevity and have a satisfying, long-life.
how long does a person have to sleep every day

Generally, adults need between 7-9 hours of sleep every day. However, this may vary depending on individual needs and lifestyle. It is important to identify a healthy sleep schedule that works for you in order to maximize your health and wellbeing.
